publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-181 Mrs Margaret Smith: Major Planning Consents-That the Parliament notes the successful appeal by developers to build housing upon Corstorphine Hill; notes that the developers have the right to rely on a 23 year old planning consent, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward instructions to require that local authorities monitor major planning consents, and issue completion notices 10 years after the initial granting of planning permission if the development has not yet been completed.

S1M-181 Mrs Margaret Smith: Major Planning Consents-That the Parliament notes the successful appeal by developers to build housing upon Corstorphine Hill; notes that the developers have the right to rely on a 23 year old planning consent, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward instructions to require that local authorities monitor major planning consents, and issue completion notices 10 years after the initial granting of planning permission if the development has not yet been completed. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S1M-181 Major Planning Consents (lodged on 30 September 1999) Nora Radcliffe*
